parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (11240002), which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda, as it's a mandatory element for campaign materials in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Alina Gorghiu, a candidate for the parliamentary elections, and promotes her candidacy by stating her missions as a future deputy and urging voters to vote for the PNL team. This directly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few.  The use of Facebook as a platform further supports this. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters to support Alina Gorghiu and the PNL party in the parliamentary elections. The call to action ("Duminică, votați echipa PNL!") explicitly aims to influence voting behavior. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic content. It lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected from journalistic pieces. Instead, it promotes a specific candidate and party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, presented as a campaign message.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1205923177168461</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a candidate (Alina Gorghiu), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the exact date is not specified, the presence of a CMF suggests it's within the campaign period), has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes for PNL), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The paid nature of the Facebook post and its targeting parameters indicate an attempt to reach a wide audience.  There are no elements suggesting this is anything other than a campaign advertisement.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Alina Gorghiu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Alina Gorghiu, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1205923177168461) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care constituie propagandă electorală, având în vedere că promovează candidatura sa la alegerile parlamentare și îndeamnă la vot pentru echipa PNL, folosind un CMF (11240002),  cu un buget de 100-199 RON,  ajungând la 8000-9000 de impresii și o estimare a audienței de 50.000-100.000 persoane. Postarea, cu textul "Acestea sunt misiunile mele ca viitor deputat. Dar pentru a reuși, am nevoie de încrederea voastră! Duminică, votați echipa PNL!",  este o formă clară de propagandă electorală, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea candidatei și a partidului PNL.  Această postare încalcă prevederile legale privind încetarea campaniei electorale, fiind publicată după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
